DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to detect the sensitivity of thyromental distance ratio as a single predictor for difficult intubation in patients undergoing cesarean section under general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Sensitivity of Hyomental Distance Ratio as a Single Predictor of Difficult Intubation in Obstetrics
DOC.detailed_description: The authors intend to use the HMDR for detection of difficult intubation in parturient undergoing cesarean section that is either elective or emergency.
DOC.criteria: All patients presenting for cesarean section under general anesthesia
